title: DrawerType
description: Props for the ZenDrawer component

title: ZenDrawer
description: A drawer component that can be opened from the left or right side of the screen. It is controlled by the useDrawer and useToggleDrawer hooks. Works on web and on mobile devices.
author: Danilo Ramírez Mattey

params.name: position
params.description: The position of the drawer (left or right)

params.name: backgroundDimmed
params.description: Whether the background should be dimmed or not

params.name: backgroundColor
params.description: The color of the background when dimmed

params.name: headerImage
params.description: An optional image to display at the top of the drawer

params.name: headerImageSize
params.description: The height of the header image

params.name: items
params.description: An array of React Elements to display as items in the drawer. Recommended to use ZenDrawerItem and ZenDrawerTitle components.

params.name: sizeRatio
params.description: The size of the drawer as a ratio of the screen width

params.name: animationTime
params.description: The time in milliseconds for the open/close animation

errors.description: The animation time is invalid. It must be a positive number.

title: ZenDrawerItem
description: A single item for the ZenDrawer component

title: ZenDrawerItem
description: A single item for the ZenDrawer component
author: Danilo Ramírez Mattey

params.name: label
params.description: The label of the drawer item

params.name: leftIcon
params.description: The name of the left icon (from ZenIcon)

params.name: rightIcon
params.description: The name of the right icon (from ZenIcon)

params.name: onPress
params.description: The function to call when the item is pressed

params.name: arrow
params.description: Whether to show a right arrow icon

params.name: closeOnPress
params.description: Whether to close the drawer when the item is pressed

title: ZenDrawerTitle
description: A title component for the ZenDrawer

title: ZenDrawerTitle
description: A title component for the ZenDrawer
author: Danilo Ramírez Mattey

params.name: title
params.description: The title text to display

title: ZenFloatingIconsType
description: Props for the ZenFloatingIcons component

title: ZenFloatingIcons
description: A set of floating icon buttons that can be positioned at the bottom of the screen
author: Danilo Ramírez Mattey

params.name: size
params.description: The size of the buttons (small, medium, large)

params.name: position
params.description: The position of the buttons (left, right, center)

params.name: buttons
params.description: An array of button objects with icon, type and onPress function

title: ZenHeaderProps
description: Props for the ZenHeader component

title: ZenHeader
description: A simple header component that will adapt to the current theme and display a title and a back button if needed
author: Danilo Ramírez Mattey

params.name: useTopSafeArea
params.description: Whether to use the top safe area or not

params.name: title
params.description: The title to display in the header

params.name: showBackButton
params.description: Whether to show the back button or not

params.name: rightIcon
params.description: The name of the right icon to display

params.name: onRightIconPress
params.description: The function to call when the right icon is pressed

params.name: rightAccessory
params.description: Any React Element to show on the right side of the header

params.name: automaticDrawerIcon
params.description: If any string is indicated, it will show a drawer icon that will open the drawer when pressed

params.name: goBack
params.description: The function to call when the back button is pressed

params.name: goBackIcon
params.description: The name of the back icon to display

title: CardHeaderProps
description: Props for the CardHeader component.

title: CardHeader
description: A simple header component for the Card component.
author: Danilo Ramírez Mattey

params.name: title
params.description: The title of the card header.

params.name: type
params.description: The theme type of the card header.

params.name: leftAccessory
params.description: The left accessory component of the card header.

params.name: rightAccessory
params.description: The right accessory component of the card header.

description: A simple footer component for the Card component.
author: Danilo Ramírez Mattey

params.name: type

params.name: children
params.description: The children components of the card footer.

title: CardProps
description: Props for the Card component.

title: Card
description: A simple card component to display content in a card-like container.
author: Danilo Ramírez Mattey

params.name: children
params.description: The content of the card.

params.name: type
params.description: The theme type of the card.

params.name: title
params.description: The title of the card.

params.name: headerLeftAccessory
params.description: The left accessory component of the card header.

params.name: headerRightAccessory
params.description: The right accessory component of the card header.

params.name: backColor
params.description: We can overwrite the background color by passing a custom color here.

params.name: header
params.description: We can overwrite the header by passing a custom component here.

params.name: footer
params.description: We can use this parameter to add a footer component to the card. We recomend using the CardFooter component.

title: LayoutProps
description: Props for the Layout component.

title: Layout
description: A layout component that provides consistent padding and optional scrolling behavior.
author: Danilo Ramírez Mattey

params.name: children
params.description: The children components to be rendered within the layout.

params.name: centered
params.description: Whether to center the children components.

params.name: scrollable
params.description: Whether the layout should be scrollable.

params.name: style
params.description: Additional styles to apply to the layout.

params.name: airBottom
params.description: Whether to add extra space at the bottom of the layout.

title: ScreenProps
description: Props for the Screen component.

title: Screen
description: The screen component should be used as the main container for every screen in the app. The idea behind it is to use it only once in the app, right after the application provider tag. It should take care of the status bar height, the bottom bar height (if there is one) and the keyboard height. This way, we can have a full screen experience even when the keyboard is open.
author: Danilo Ramírez Mattey

params.name: children
params.description: The main content of the screen. It could be anything, including React elements.

params.name: useTopSafeArea
params.description: If true, the screen will use the top safe area. This is useful when you have a full screen and not planing to use react navigator or other similar libraries that already take care of the top safe area. Default is false.

params.name: extraBottomPadding
params.description: If you need to add extra padding to the bottom of the screen, you can use this prop. Default is 0.

title: TableProps
description: Props for the Table component.

title: Table
description: A simple table component that will help you to create a grid layout
author: Danilo Ramírez Mattey

example.code:
import { Column, Row, Table, ZenText } from 'react-zen-ui'; export default function TablesExample(){ return ( <> Tables Simple table components to create grid layouts. It consists of a Table component that wraps Row components, which in turn wrap Column components. You can enable borders and customize their appearance. Bordered table: 1,1 1,2 1,3 2,1 2,2 2,3 3,1 3,2 3,3
); }

params.name: style
params.description: The additional styles to be added to the table. Default is null

params.name: children
params.description: The child component of the table. This is required

params.name: border
params.description: The border of the table. Default is false

params.name: borderType
params.description: The border type of the table. Default is solid. Options are: solid, dotted, dashed

params.name: borderColor
params.description: The border color of the table. Default is the text color of the current theme

title: Row
description: A simple row component that will help you to create a grid layout

params.name: props
params.description: The props of the row component

params.name: children
params.description: The child component of the row. This is required

params.name: style
params.description: The additional styles to be added to the row. Default is null

title: ColumnProps
description: Props for the Column component.

params.name: children
params.description: The child component of the column. This is required

params.name: style
params.description: The additional styles to be added to the column. Default is null

params.name: border
params.description: The border of the column. Default is false

params.name: borderType
params.description: The border type of the column. Default is solid. Options are: solid, dotted, dashed

params.name: borderColor
params.description: The border color of the column. Default is the text color of the current theme

params.name: span
params.description: The number of columns to span. Default is 1

title: Column
description: A simple column component that will help you to create a grid layout

params.name: props
params.description: The props of the column component

params.name: children
params.description: The child component of the column. This is required

params.name: style
params.description: The additional styles to be added to the column. Default is null

params.name: border
params.description: The border of the column. Default is false

params.name: borderType
params.description: The border type of the column. Default is solid. Options are: solid, dotted, dashed

params.name: borderColor
params.description: The border color of the column. Default is the text color of the current theme

params.name: span
params.description: The number of columns to span. Default is 1

title: ZenDividerProps
description: Props for the ZenDivider component.

title: ZenDivider
description: Component to create a customizable divider line.
author: Danilo Ramírez Mattey

example.code:
import {  Layout, Screen, ZenText, ZenDivider } from 'react-zen-ui';

 export default function DividerScreen() {
     return (
     <>
         <Screen useTopSafeArea={false}>
             <Layout scrollable={true}>
                 <ZenText type={'p'} paragraph={true} align={'justify'}>
                   Sometimes you just need a divider for your content. Here are some
                   examples of how to use the ZenDivider component in different styles
                   and types.
                 </ZenText>
                 <ZenDivider type={'primary'} />
                 <ZenText type={'h6'} paragraph={true} align={'justify'}>
                   Another text divided from the one above
                 </ZenText>
                 <ZenDivider type={'secondary'} />
                 <ZenText type={'h5'} paragraph={true} align={'justify'}>
                    Another text
                 </ZenText>
                 <ZenDivider type={'danger'} />
                 <ZenText type={'h4'} paragraph={true} align={'justify'}>
                    Another text
                 </ZenText>
                 <ZenDivider type={'warning'} />
                 <ZenText type={'h3'} paragraph={true} align={'justify'}>
                    Another text
                 </ZenText>
                 <ZenDivider type={'info'} />
                 <ZenText type={'h2'} paragraph={true} align={'justify'}>
                    Another text
                 </ZenText>
             </Layout>
         </Screen>
     </>
     );
 }

params.name: type
params.description: The theme type for the divider color. Supports primary, secondary, success, danger, warning, info.

params.name: opacity
params.description: The opacity of the divider line. Default is 0.3.

params.name: thickness
params.description: The thickness of the divider line in pixels. Default is 2.

params.name: marginFactor
params.description: Factor to multiply the standard layout space for top and bottom margins. Default is 0.5.

title: ZenSpaceBlockProps
description: Props for the ZenSpaceBlock component.
author: Danilo Ramírez Mattey

title: ZenSpaceBlock
description: A simple component that adds vertical space based on a factor of the standard layout space.
author: Danilo Ramírez Mattey

params.name: factor
params.description: The factor to multiply the standard layout space. Default is 2.

title: ZenButtonProps
description: Props for the ZenButton component.

title: ZenButton
description: A simple button component that can be used throughout the app. It supports different types (primary, secondary, success, info, warning, danger) and all of them are styled according to the current theme. The text color will be automatically selected based on the brightness of the button color, but it can be overwritten by passing a textColor prop.
author: Danilo Ramírez Mattey

params.name: title
params.description: The title of the button

params.name: type
params.description: The type of the button. Can be 'primary', 'secondary', 'success', 'info', 'warning', or 'danger'. Default is 'primary'.

params.name: textColor
params.description: The color of the button text. If not provided, it will be automatically selected based on the button color.

params.name: fill
params.description: Whether the button should fill the width of its container. Default is true.

params.name: touchableOpacity
params.description: The opacity of the button when pressed. Default is 0.7.

params.name: pressAction
params.description: Alias for pressAction

params.name: onPress
params.description: onPress action

params.name: longPressAction
params.description: Alias for longPressAction

params.name: onLongPress
params.description: onLongPress action

params.name: leftIcon
params.description: The left icon of the button. Should be a valid icon name from the ZenIcon component.

params.name: rightIcon
params.description: The right icon of the button. Should be a valid icon name from the ZenIcon component.

params.name: leftAccessory
params.description: A left accessory. Accepts any valid React Node.

params.name: rightAccessory
params.description: A right accessory. Accepts any valid React Node.

params.name: disabled
params.description: Whether the button is disabled. Default is false.

params.name: style
params.description: Additional styles for the button container.

title: ZenCheckProps
description: Props for the ZenCheck component.

title: ZenCheck
description: A simple checkbox component that can be used throughout the app. It supports different types (primary, secondary, success, info, warning, danger) and all of them are styled according to the current theme. The checkbox can be positioned to the left or right of the label.
author: Danilo Ramírez Mattey

params.name: type
params.description: The type of the checkbox. Can be 'primary', 'secondary', 'success', 'info', 'warning', or 'danger'. Default is 'primary'.

params.name: label
params.description: The label of the checkbox.

params.name: value
params.description: The initial value of the checkbox. Default is false.

params.name: position
params.description: The position of the checkbox relative to the label. Can be 'left' or 'right'. Default is 'left'.

params.name: onChange
params.description: The function to call when the value of the checkbox changes.

params.name: style
params.description: Additional styles for the checkbox container.

params.name: useBackground
params.description: Whether to use a background color for the checkbox icon. Default is false.

params.name: disabled
params.description: Whether the checkbox is disabled. Default is false.

title: ZenCode
description: A simple code block component that can be used to display code snippets throughout the app. It styles the code block according to the current theme.
author: Danilo Ramírez Mattey

params.name: content
params.description: The code content to display

params.name: light
params.description: A value to lighten or darken the background color. Default is -0.1 (slightly darker).

title: ZenIconProps
description: Props for the ZenIcon component.

title: ZenIcon
description: A simple icon component that will adapt to the current theme and display the provided icon. If you want to overwrite the color, you can provide a color prop to change it. By default, the icon will adjust to the text color, size and format of the current theme.
author: Danilo Ramírez Mattey

params.name: name
params.description: The icon we want to use

params.name: style
params.description: Additional styles for the icon

params.name: size
params.description: Number The size of the icon

params.name: color
params.description: The Color of the Icon. Default to text color of the theme

params.name: onPress
params.description: onPress action

params.name: disabled
params.description: Whether the icon is disabled. Default is false.

title: ZenIconButtonType
description: Type definition for the ZenIconButton component props.

title: ZenIconButton
description: A button component that displays an icon and handles press and long-press actions with customizable styles and themes.
author: Danilo Ramírez Mattey

example.code:
import { Column, Layout, Row, Screen, Table, ZenIconButton, ZenText, } from 'react-zen-ui'; import { StyleSheet } from 'react-native'; export default function IconButtonsScreen() { const styles = StyleSheet.create({ column: { justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center' }, }); return ( <> Buttons can be also used with icons only. These are called Icon Buttons. They can be used in toolbars or action bars to represent actions with icons only. They can be primary, secondary, warning, info or danger types. < ZenIconButton icon={'home'} />
); }

params.name: icon
params.description: The name of the icon to display.

params.name: type
params.description: The theme type for the button (e.g., 'primary', 'secondary').

params.name: size
params.description: The size of the button ('small', 'medium', 'large').

params.name: touchableOpacity
params.description: The opacity of the button when pressed.

params.name: disabled
params.description: Whether the button is disabled.

params.name: style
params.description: Additional styles for the button.

params.name: pressAction
params.description: Function to execute on button press.

params.name: onPress
params.description: Additional function to execute on button press.

params.name: longPressAction
params.description: Function to execute on button long press.

params.name: onLongPress
params.description: Additional function to execute on button long press.

params.name: opacity
params.description: The overall opacity of the button.

params.name: spacing

title: ZenLoadingProps
description: Props for the ZenLoading component.

title: ZenLoading
description: A loading indicator using an animated icon. You can set the size to small, medium or large.

example.code:
import { Column, ZenLoading, ZenText, Table, Row } from 'react-zen-ui'; export default function LoadingExample(){ return ( <> Loading
); }

params.name: size
params.description: The size of the loading indicator. Can be 'small', 'large' or a number. Default is 'small'

params.name: color
params.description: The color of the loading indicator. Default is the text color of the current theme

params.name: duration
params.description: The duration of one full rotation in milliseconds. Default is 1500ms

title: ZenSelect
description: A select component with a label. The label is optional. Based on ZenInput.
author: Danilo Ramírez Mattey

params.name: items
params.description: The list of items to select from. This is required

params.name: label
params.description: The label for the select component

params.name: placeholder
params.description: The placeholder for the select component

params.name: dir
params.description: The direction of the text. Can be 'ltr' or 'rtl'. Default is 'ltr'

params.name: leftIcon
params.description: The left icon name

params.name: leftAccessory
params.description: The left accessory element

params.name: disabled
params.description: Whether the select is disabled

params.name: type
params.description: The theme type for the select. Default is 'primary'

params.name: defaultValue
params.description: The default selected value

params.name: onChange
params.description: Callback function when the selected item changes

params.name: maxNumberOfVisibleItems
params.description: The maximum number of items to show when the select is opened. Default is 3

title: ZenTextProps
description: Props for the ZenText component.

title: ZenText
description: The most basic text component that will adapt to the current theme

params.name: children
params.description: The text content to be displayed within the ZenText component.

params.name: style
params.description: Additional styles to customize the appearance of the text.

params.name: size
params.description: The size of the text. Can be 'small', 'medium', 'large' or a number.

params.name: type
params.description: The type of text style to apply. Options are 'h1', 'h2', 'h3', 'h4', 'h5', 'h6', 'p', 'small'.

params.name: align
params.description: The alignment of the text. Options are 'left', 'center', 'right', 'justify'.

params.name: paragraph
params.description: Whether to add margin to the top and bottom of the text to separate it as a paragraph.

params.name: textColor
params.description: The color of the text. Defaults to the text color of the current theme.

params.name: fill
params.description: Whether the text should take the full width of its container.

title: ZenImageSliderItem
description: Props for each item in ZenImageSlider component.
author: Danilo Ramírez Mattey

title: ZenImageSliderProps
description: Props for ZenImageSlider component.
author: Danilo Ramírez Mattey

title: ZenImageSlider
description: A simple image slider component with pagination.
author: Danilo Ramírez Mattey

params.name: images
params.description: Array of images to display. Each image can have a source, optional onPress action, and optional title. Format: { source: any; onPress?: () => void; title?: string; }

params.name: type
params.description: Theme type

params.name: ratio
params.description: Aspect ratio (width / height)

params.name: pagination
params.description: Show pagination dots

params.name: paginationRelationToImage
params.description: Size of pagination dots in relation to image width

params.name: bordered
params.description: Show border around the slider

title: ZenPlay
description: A play button component overlayed on an image, with optional left text and right icon.
author: Danilo Ramírez Mattey

params.name: type
params.description: The theme type for the component (e.g., 'primary', 'secondary').

params.name: imageSource
params.description: The source of the image to display.

params.name: style
params.description: Additional styles for the component container.

params.name: onPress
params.description: Function to execute when the play button is pressed.

params.name: icon
params.description: The name of the icon to display on the play button.

params.name: leftText
params.description: Optional text to display at the bottom left of the image.

params.name: bordered
params.description: Whether to display a border around the component. Default is false.

title: ZenProfileProps
description: Props for the ZenProfile component.

title: ZenProfile
description: A profile component that displays a banner image, an avatar image, a title, a subtitle element, a description, and a footer. The avatar image is positioned overlapping the banner image. The component is styled according to the current theme and supports different types (primary, secondary, success, info, warning, danger).
author: Danilo Ramírez Mattey

params.name: type
params.description: The theme type for the component. Can be 'primary', 'secondary', 'success', 'info', 'warning', or 'danger'. Default is 'primary'.

params.name: bannerImageSource
params.description: The source for the banner image.

params.name: title
params.description: The title of the profile.

params.name: subTitleElement
params.description: The subtitle element of the profile.

params.name: bordered
params.description: Whether the avatar and banner images should have borders. Default is true.

params.name: bannerHeight
params.description: The height of the banner image. Default is 150.

params.name: description
params.description: The description of the profile.

params.name: style
params.description: Additional styles for the profile container.

title: ZenSpotlight
description: A spotlight component that displays an image with an optional footer and an icon button.
author: Danilo Ramírez Mattey

params.name: title
params.description: Optional title to be displayed on top of the image.

params.name: titleBackground
params.description: Whether the title should have a background for better visibility. Default is false.

params.name: titleType
params.description: The text type for the title. Default is 'h3'.

params.name: imageSource
params.description: The source of the image to be displayed.

params.name: footerText
params.description: Optional text to be displayed in the footer.

params.name: iconName
params.description: The name of the icon to be displayed in the button. Default is 'arrow-right-circle'.

params.name: type
params.description: The theme type for the component. Default is 'primary'.

params.name: bordered
params.description: Whether the image should have a border. Default is false.

params.name: borderRounded
params.description: Whether the border should be rounded. Default is false.

params.name: style
params.description: Additional styles for the container.

params.name: onPress
params.description: Function to be called when the icon button is pressed.

title: useDrawer
description: A custom hook to access the current state of the drawer (open or closed) from the ZenThemeContext. Its call must be made inside the context of a ZenThemeProvider.
author: Danilo Ramírez Mattey

return.description: The current state of the drawer (true for open, false for closed)

title: useToggleDrawer
description: A custom hook to toggle the drawer state (open or closed) from the ZenThemeContext. Its call must be made inside the context of a ZenThemeProvider.
author: Danilo Ramírez Mattey

return.description: A function to toggle the drawer state

title: useTheme
description: A custom hook to access the current theme from the ZenThemeContext. It will contain all the theme properties defined in the ThemeModel. Its call must be made inside the context of a ZenThemeProvider.
author: Danilo Ramírez Mattey

title: Intro
description: ZenUI is a React component library that provides a set of customizable and themeable UI components to help developers build modern mobile applications with ease. It offers a variety of components such as buttons, inputs, icons, and layouts, all designed to be responsive and visually appealing. With ZenUI, developers can quickly create beautiful and functional user interfaces while maintaining consistency across their applications.
author: Danilo Ramírez Mattey

title: hex2
description: Convert a number to a two-digit hexadecimal string

params.name: c
params.description: The number to convert

title: color
description: Create a hex color string from RGB values

params.name: r
params.description: The red factor (0-255)

params.name: g
params.description: The green factor (0-255)

params.name: b
params.description: The blue factor (0-255)

title: shade
description: Shade a hex color by a given light factor

params.name: col
params.description: The hex color to shade

params.name: light
params.description: The light factor (-1 to 1). Negative values darken the color, positive values lighten it.

title: hexToRgb
description: Convert a hex color string to an RGB object

return.description: The RGB color string in the format 'rgba(r, g, b, opacity)' or null if the hex string is invalid

params.name: hex
params.description: The hex color string

params.name: opacity
params.description: The opacity value (0-1)

title: getContrastTextColor
description: Given a hex color, determine whether black or white text would provide better contrast.

return.description: '#000000' for black text or '#ffffff' for white text

params.name: hexColor
params.description: * @returns {string} '#000000' for black text or '#ffffff' for white text
